entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:05 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 01:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
